bill_title: make an appropriation to support students participating in the South Dakota Opportunity Scholarship program during fiscal year 2007.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to support students participating in the South Dakota Opportunity Scholarship program during fiscal year 2007. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated to the Board of Regents three million seventy-six thousand dollars ($3,076,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from moneys deposited in the general fund from the earnings of the permanent tobacco settlement trust fund created pursuant to § 5-12-57. The Board of Regents shall award so much of the moneys appropriated by this Act as may be necessary to support students participating in the South Dakota Opportunity Scholarship program during fiscal year 2007. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
